title: Into You Chapter 1
body:
BTS College AU

Pairings: yoongi x reader, Jungkook x reader

angst, fluff

Word Count: 1,544

Warnings: swearing, future adult themes

Tag List: if you want to be tagged please message me!!


It was Saturday morning. Lisa and Y/n were staying at Y/n’s Aunt Mari’s apartment with all their things for college. Yes, she and her two friends, Jungkook and Lisa, were starting school at the University of Seoul together in two days. Lisa had been Y/n’s best friend since they were babies. Jungkook meeting the two girls in preschool and all of them connecting through similar interests. Lisa and Y/n were going to the University for Music and Jungkook was going for Photography, something he has always loved. He was good at it too! Always taking pictures of his friends and whatever else caught his eyes just right.

Y/N’S POV

I felt my bed shift and then the slight breathing in my ear.

“Y/n.” I heard. I let out a sigh and shift in sleep. “Hey, come on Y/n. Get the hell up!” Lisa yells. Good thing my Aunt Mari wasn’t home at the moment. I woke up fully with a slight jump.

“What? Do you know what time it is?” I ask annoyed. I sit up rubbing the tired out of my eyes. “This better be good Lisa.” I say as I cross my arms and look over at her.

“It is! Anyways, college starts in two days! Do you know who your dorm buddies are yet?” Lisa asks, I sigh in frustration. Questions this early in the morning were normal for Lisa. She only took her sleep meds when she absolutely needed them.

“No… I never looked at the dorm list.” I say tiredly and push the covers off me starting to get up.

“What the hell Y/n, I thought I raised you better than this.” Lisa says watching me move around blindly in the dark. I take out my phone and went to the campus website.

“You didn’t raise me though?” I began as I checked the dorm list. “Looks like you are rooming with me and some girl named Yuna.” I finished right before my phone starts to ding multiple times.

Message to; Y/n

-hey, let me know when you get your dorm key and number.

-I’ll help you move your stuff if you want. Also Kookie says you owe him a new shirt, preferably white.

Message to; Jhope

-Jungkook has a dumb obsession with white shirts istg

-he needs more color in his life so I think I will get him a pink shirt instead. Just to spite him.

Message to; Y/n

-What are you doing up so early?

Message to; Jhope

-Lisa wanted to know who we are rooming with.

Message to; Y/n

-you should probably go check that before the list is taken down…

Message to; Jhope

-you’re asking me to do so much rn

-I haven’t eve had my coffee yet.

-Already checked though. We’re good

Message to; Y/n

-you fucking work at Starbucks, go in and get one.

Message to; Jhope

-I am not mentally nor physically ready to have the world see the monstrosity that is my face.

Message to; Y/n

-You model part time Y/n

-If your face was a monstrosity nobody, not even Kook would want you to model for them.

Message to; Jhope

-Good point. Thanks bae, love you

“Hoseok?” Lisa asks and I nodded.

“Who else would text me this early in the morning?” I say with a small chuckle and go to my dresser to get some leggings, a tank top and some socks out of the drawer. As I get ready for the day I decide to text Jungkook.

Message to; Kookie

-Jungkook, I have that shirt I owe you. You can get it tomorrow or something.

-I would say today but I am suuuper busy.

Message to; Y/n

-bull

-What could you possibly be doing today that isn’t napping?

Message to; Kookie

-Being fucking fabulous!!

Message to; Y/n

-I’m blocking you..

Message to; Kookie

-Nooo, what do you want me to do? Beg on my knees?

Message to; Y/n

-Well…

Message to; Kookie

-OMG NO Kook, I was kidding. You are like twelve years old.

-Anyways, you could come today to get your shirt but Lisa and I are moving our things into our dorm. Jhope is helping us too.

-You could come and help so we can get food afterwards.

Message to; Y/n

-Are you trying to bribe me into helping you though you still owe me a shirt?

Message to; Kookie

-No?

Message to; Y/n

-Fine I’ll come.

-But not because you need help. I’m simply helping out Lisa

Message to; Kookie

-Good! Seeya a the dorms later!

I pulled my hair back out of my face and decided to go get coffee from Starbucks like Hoseok said. I looked at myself one more time in my full body mirror and then went out into the kitchen and living area.

“Going to grab coffee. Want anything?” I ask Lisa who decided it was the perfect time to do her nails.

“No thank you. Tell Eunho that I said hi though!” Lisa says in a sing song voice as I start to the door, grabbing my keys and wallet.

“Don’t go wandering off without a buddy! Oh and if you do go somewhere, let me know so I don’t worry!.” I yell to her as I close the door.

Walking out of my Aunt’s apartment and into the crisp morning air, I am hit with a coldness. I silently curse that I didn’t bring a jacket. the walk to Starbucks was a bit far from my Aunt Mari’s place but closer to the school and dorms. So I wasn’t complaining. The door chimed as I walked in and surprisingly the coffee shop wasn’t very full. Especially this early in the morning around rush hour times. It was weird.

“Hi! What can I get you?” the newest employee, Aki asks in a fake happy voice. I smile though and get my usual Strawberries and Cream Frappe. I give her my name and then go to Eunho, my favorite employee out of everyone that I work with. He reminds me of a male version of Lisa.

“Hey Y/n. Been a while.” He says quietly in his laid back voice.

“It has literally been two days Eunho. Are you on something?” I chuckle looking at him up and down. He looked higher than normal and it was worrying me a bit.

“Just high on 3 energy drinks and 3 hours of sleep. Ahh, the college life.” he says and sips from his water bottle.

“Y/n!”

“Well, Lisa says hi, take it easy with those drinks and I’ll see you later.” I say as I back away from him. I turn around and grab the coffee from Aki. I give her a small smile and go to walk out when I bump into someone hard. Making my Frappe spill all over me.

“Shit. I am so sorry.” a male voice says. I go to wipe up my shirt and the guy follows, “Look. Here.” he says and hands me his jacket.

“It’s okay. You don’t need to give me your jacket…” I trail off as he insists and also gets me another drink.

“I’m really sorry. I should have watched where I was going.” he says, “I’m Yoongi by the way.”

“It’s really okay Yoongi. If it was hot coffee then we’d have a problem.” I joke, “My name is Y/n though.” I finish.

“Take my jacket. You can return it to me on o9ur first date.” Yoongi says with a small smile. I can’t help but giggle at how corny that sounded. We exchanged numbers and then he left with a small smile and wave.

I slipped on Yoongi’s jacket and took my new drink from Eunho, who was watching the whole thing go down. Now he was giving me a knowing look.

Once I stepped out of Starbucks, I started feeling super anxious.I rushed back to my aunt’s apartment, my heart beating faster than it usually did. Hoseok was already there with his rented van to take mine and Lisa’s stuff to the dorms. I immediately sat on the apartment steps feeling like I was going to pass out. Lisa and Hoseok came out of the apartment conversing between each other when they see me.

“Nice jacket Y/n.” Hoseok says and I give him a tight closed mouth smile. Lisa notices my distress and sits down along with Hoseok.

“Are you okay Y/n? You look anxious.” Lisa points out, she always knew me best.

“I have a possible date and I’m freaking out. You guys know how terrible I am around cute guys.” I rush my words out, taking a deep breath to try and calm myself down.

“Okay, okay. Jungkook is grabbing the last box and locking up. o we can all talk on the way to the dorms yeah?” Hoseok suggest. I just nod agreeing it would be easier that way. Then I wouldn’t have to repeat myself and get all worked up again.

angst, fluff

It was Saturday morning. Lisa and Y/n were staying at Y/n’s Aunt Mari’s apartment with all their things for college. Yes, she and her two friends, Jungkook and Lisa, were starting school at the University of Seoul together in two days. Lisa had been Y/n’s best friend since they were babies. Jungkook meeting the two girls in preschool and all of them connecting through similar interests. Lisa and Y/n were going to the University for Music and Jungkook was going for Photography, something he has always loved. He was good at it too! Always taking pictures of his friends and whatever else caught his eyes just right.

Y/N’S POV

I felt my bed shift and then the slight breathing in my ear.

“Y/n.” I heard. I let out a sigh and shift in sleep. “Hey, come on Y/n. Get the hell up!” Lisa yells. Good thing my Aunt Mari wasn’t home at the moment. I woke up fully with a slight jump.

“What? Do you know what time it is?” I ask annoyed. I sit up rubbing the tired out of my eyes. “This better be good Lisa.” I say as I cross my arms and look over at her.

“It is! Anyways, college starts in two days! Do you know who your dorm buddies are yet?” Lisa asks, I sigh in frustration. Questions this early in the morning were normal for Lisa. She only took her sleep meds when she absolutely needed them.

“No… I never looked at the dorm list.” I say tiredly and push the covers off me starting to get up.

“What the hell Y/n, I thought I raised you better than this.” Lisa says watching me move around blindly in the dark. I take out my phone and went to the campus website.

“You didn’t raise me though?” I began as I checked the dorm list. “Looks like you are rooming with me and some girl named Yuna.” I finished right before my phone starts to ding multiple times.

“Hoseok?” Lisa asks and I nodded.

title: Freaking Perfect
body:
by Shunnybee

Big Yoongi loves Namjoon… and little Yoongi especially loves Namjoon and his little self. But he can’t seem to stop comparing himself to the younger man. Don’t get Yoongi wrong; he accepts all his faults but there’s this nagging voice that always creeps up on him and starts pointing out differences between him and Namjoon. Big Yoongi can handle that voice but little Yoongi can’t so on days that voice is there, there’s no little Yoongi.

Of course this worried his friends, Namjoon especially, but no one confronted the man about it knowing he’d shut them down as soon as they tried. Even little Yoongi wouldn’t answer anyone, not even Namu. And neither Namu nor Namjoon were okay with that.

title: 30 Metas Para O Amor Perfeito
body:
by sonumber

Jimin resolveu deixar de lado sua pose de heterossexual para passar um mês ao lado de Min Yoongi, sendo seu namorado 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana. É claro, ele não esperava que fosse se apaixonar perdidamente pelo garoto que beijou no calor do momento, e não pensou que esse mesmo garoto se tornaria tão importante em sua vida.
Nenhum dos dois nem ao menos imaginara que aquele mês juntos poderia se tornar o mais delicioso sonho de suas vidas.
